text: Katsiaryna Belanovich (née Artsiukh; born October 14, 1991) is a Belarusian hurdler. She competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the women's 400 metres hurdles race; her time of 56.55 seconds in the heats did not qualify her for the semifinals. She originally won a won gold medal at the 2010 World Junior Championships in Athletics, but was subsequently disqualified for doping. ==See also== *List of doping cases in athletics ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Belarusian female hurdlers Category:Olympic female hurdlers Category:Olympic athletes of Belarus Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Belarusian sportspeople in doping cases Category:Doping cases in athletics
title: Katsiaryna Belanovich
